content: This article is baseless and journalistic rubbish. Since taking office, he has been doing a great job. He has addressed many issues, and left other problems of the last administration to analyse an effective solution. Luckily, he is different and is not just an observer, he is a ‘do-er!’ Known for his outrageous claims and rants.. he has been pretty close to the mark, so when he claims this article is rubbish, I hope it is all recyclable waste.
